recipes.title: High-Protein Greek Yogurt Bowl
steps: Mix Greek yogurt with protein powder until smooth
Top with berries, honey, and granola

recipes.title: Turkey Wrap
steps: Roll tightly and cut in half

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
steps: Mix Greek yogurt with lemon juice

recipes.title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Spray pan and cook diced chicken
Season with soy sauce and garlic

recipes.title: Microwave Salmon Bowl
steps: Season salmon with lemon, salt, and pepper

recipes.title: Shrimp Cauliflower Rice Bowl
steps: Season and cook shrimp 2-3 minutes per side

recipes.title: Protein Yogurt Bark
steps: Mix yogurt with protein powder and honey
Freeze for 2 hours, break into pieces

recipes.title: Tuna Cucumber Bites
steps: Mix tuna with Greek yogurt and lemon

recipes.title: Protein Overnight Oats
steps: Mix oats, protein powder, and chia seeds
Add almond milk and stir well
Top with banana and cinnamon before eating

recipes.title: Protein Coffee Smoothie
steps: Blend coffee, protein powder, and banana
Add cocoa powder and blend briefly

recipes.title: Protein Pancakes
steps: Cook small pancakes 2 min each side

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Chicken Fajitas
steps: Toss chicken and vegetables with oil and seasoning

recipes.title: Quinoa Power Bowl
recipes.description: Plant-based protein bowl with complete amino acids

recipes.title: Protein Smoothie Bowl
steps: Blend banana, protein, yogurt, and milk
Top with chia seeds and berries

recipes.title: Savory Protein Waffles
steps: Top with extra cottage cheese if desired

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Bowl
steps: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, and tahini

recipes.title: Protein Rice Cakes
steps: Spread protein cookie butter on rice cakes

recipes.title: Tofu Stir-Fry
ingredients: 14 oz firm tofu, pressed and cubed
steps: Press tofu for 15 minutes and cube

recipes.title: Protein-Packed Breakfast Burrito
steps: Layer eggs, beans, cheese in tortilla

recipes.title: Tempeh Buddha Bowl
steps: Marinate tempeh in tamari and maple syrup
Assemble bowl with rice and vegetables

recipes.title: Protein Deviled Eggs
steps: Mix yolks with yogurt and mustard

recipes.title: Pesto Chicken Zoodles
steps: Heat olive oil and cook zoodles
Top with chicken and pine nuts

recipes.title: Protein-Packed Sushi Bowl
steps: Serve with soy sauce and wasabi

recipes.title: Protein French Toast

steps: Mix eggs, protein shake, and vanilla

recipes.title: Buffalo Chicken Celery Boats
steps: Mix chicken with yogurt and buffalo sauce

recipes.title: Protein Breakfast Muffins
steps: Blend eggs, cottage cheese, and protein

recipes.title: 3-Minute Protein Microwave Oats
steps: Mix oats, protein powder, and milk in a bowl
Top with peanut butter and banana

recipes.title: 2-Egg Protein Wrap
steps: Scramble eggs and cook turkey bacon
Add eggs and bacon, wrap up

recipes.title: 5-Min Chicken Protein Bowl
steps: Layer bowl with greens, rice, chicken

recipes.title: 3-Min Turkey Protein Stack
steps: Layer turkey, cheese, and spinach on wrap
Roll tightly and cut in half

recipes.title: Quick Cottage Cheese Bowl
steps: Mix cottage cheese with protein powder

recipes.title: Quick Protein Pita Pizza
steps: Top pita with sauce and chicken

recipes.title: 5-Min Protein Salad Jar
steps: Add dressing when ready to eat

recipes.title: 3-Min Protein Rice Bowl
steps: Mix in tuna and sliced avocado
Season with soy sauce and seasoning

recipes.title: Chicken Power Bowl
steps: Assemble bowl and top with salsa and yogurt

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Burrito Bowl
steps: Combine in bowl with beans and pico
Top with avocado and hot sauce

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Protein Mousse
steps: Whisk yogurt with protein and cocoa
Chill 5 minutes and top with chocolate

recipes.title: Protein Cheesecake Bites
steps: Mix yogurt, protein, and lemon juice
Layer crushed crackers and yogurt mix

recipes.title: Quick Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Roll tightly and slice in half

recipes.title: Protein Pita Pocket
steps: Warm pita in microwave for 15 seconds

recipes.title: Protein Energy Balls
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl

recipes.title: Quick Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Cook chicken in pan for 3 minutes
Add frozen vegetables and cook 2 minutes
Add soy sauce and sesame oil
Serve over rice, top with seeds

recipes.title: High-Calorie Protein Bowl
steps: Brown ground beef in pan (4 minutes)
Top with cheese, sour cream, salsa
